name: Nottingham Goose Catcher Prototype
description:
Welcome to the Nottingham Goose Catching Prototype!

This project is made in Unreal Engine 4, using the Maya 3D modelling software for the player and Aseprite pixel art for the texture, geese, and NPC's.

In this prototype, you can:

  • Run about a room!
  • Throw bread around the place!
  • Catch FOUR geese running rampant!
  • Talk to our lovely NPC, Morko!

Experience the beauty of our 3D modelled hero in a pixel art textured world!

WHAT COULD BE BETTER THAN THIS?

If you could explore around interesting places in Nottingham while catching these geese!

FULL GAME FEATURES:

  • A wide scope of real Nottingham locations to explore!
  • Educational facts to learn about the areas you visit!
  • And, as this game's premise suggests... LOTS OF GEESE TO CATCH.
